message: I'm looking through the various gems for tagging and don't see a clear winner. Which tagging gem is most used these days and is well maintained?
It appears that acts-as-taggable-on is the most popular according to http://www.ruby-toolbox.com/categories/rails_tagging.html. Is that true?
I've been using acts_as_taggable for a while. It's stable and pretty easy to use.
Ugh, ignore that... it's there too, yay cross posting
You might have more success creating this topic on the Rails group, acts_as_taggable_on is probably the most popular one
